scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n client,server -c auto "npm run dev -w apps/client" "npm run dev -w apps/server"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/client && npm run build -w apps/server
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/client && npm run lint -w apps/server
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/client && npm run test -w apps/server && playwright test
